attributes.additional_details:
A petition to cap the wages of sports men and women. It is disgraceful that an individual can make £300,000 a week when 3.5 million children are in poverty.

A petition to cap the wages of sportsmen and woman

rejection.details: This is a matter for individual clubs and also the football authorities and the Government cannot intervene.   The Government is, however, monitoring the governance and financial Fair Play rules.
